ctx: intros l1 l2 l3 a H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce plusP to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros l1 l2 l3 a H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 6 branches.

original: unfold canonical. unfold pX. intros l1 l2 l3 a H1 H2 H3 H4. simpl in *. unfold plusP in H1. destruct H1 as [H5 _]. unfold canonical in H2. unfold canonical in H3. unfold canonical in H4. destruct H5 as [H6 _]. destruct H6 as [H7 _]. rewrite <- H7 in H2. rewrite <- H7 in H3. rewrite <- H7 in H4. auto.
